name: mono-nuxt-cloudflare-hono-template
description: Monorepo template for Nuxt 3 web app and website, using Cloudflare Workers with Hono for backend.
author: ManasMadrecha

scripts.i:f: npm run i:f:common:base && npm run i:f:website && npm run i:f:apps:app1
scripts.i:all: npm run i:b && npm run i:f
scripts.dev:f:apps:app1: npm run prepare:f:common:base && npm run dev:s --workspace=f/apps/app1
scripts.dev:f:website: npm run prepare:f:common:base && npm run dev:s --workspace=f/website
scripts.dev:f: npm run dev:f:apps:app1 && npm run dev:f:website
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:b && npm run dev:f
scripts.build:f: npm run build:f:apps:app1 && npm run build:f:website
scripts.build:all: npm run build:b && npm run build:f
scripts.deploy:f: npm run deploy:f:apps && npm run deploy:f:website
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:b && npm run deploy:f
